Class STEUERZENTRALE

public class STEUERZENTRALE

The class STEUERZENTRALE is the executive class of the term generator.

ErgebnisPruefen

public java.lang.String ErgebnisPruefen(double erg)
Method ErgebnisPruefen Compairs the users' result with the oldest, right and unsolved result.

Parameters:
erg - The users' result
Returns:
an answer: "Right" or "Wrong", depending on whether the result is correct.

KlammerTerm

public java.lang.String KlammerTerm(int klammertiefe)
Method KlammerTerm Generates a random term with a random nesting depth.

Parameters:
klammertiefe - The required nesting depth (e.g. 1 -> one number; 2 -> a+b)
Returns:
Term

randTermKlasse

public TERM randTermKlasse()
Method randTermKlasse A subclass of TERM is randomly choosen, with which the program works.

Returns:
a class SUMME (sum), DIFFERENZ (difference) , PRODUKT (product) and DIVISION

showErster

Method showErster shows the saved result.

TermKlammertiefe

public java.lang.String TermKlammertiefe(int klammertiefe,
                                         double erg,
                                         boolean start)
Method TermKlammertiefe Generates a term with the required nesting depth and an (optional) result.

Parameters:
klammertiefe - The required nesting depth.
erg - A result which can be decomposed recursively into a term.
start - Tells you if this is the final or a intermediate term.
Returns:
Term
